## Checklist

- [ ] Update function in `R/`
- [ ] Update roxygen docs (`@param`, `@examples`)
- [ ] Add/update tests in `tests/testthat/`
- [ ] Run `devtools::document()` — regenerate `man/` and `NAMESPACE`
- [ ] Run `devtools::test()` — all tests pass
- [ ] Run `devtools::check()` — no errors, warnings, or notes
